ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Quest Gems help needed
ygData.msgSnippet: Icewell and Velk were the two that I ve found to drop gems most frequently. In CS there is no faction hit when killing drakes and wyverns unless it s a named
ygData.messageBody:
Icewell and Velk were the two that I've found to drop gems most frequently.
In CS there is no faction hit when killing drakes and wyverns unless it's a
named one (Ycolcarn and the named drake I forget). Fairly easy to charm kite
things on the beach below, and now there is less of a danger of getting
cremated by ae drake spells since the patch. Before then I was afraid to
even sit around for any length of time. If someone would train 2 drakes by
you, and I mean even *close* to you, you'd be hit by their ae prolly 2x
each, and at avg of 400+ per shot, that's 1600 of your hps gone right there.
Unbuffed at 55 I have a good bit less than that! /mourn Pava


Pava
CT
